This is probably the best, and smallest 720p rip of avatar you will find. Looks great even on a 55"LCD, it even looks better than some 1080p rips that are double this size.  The bitrate is appropriate for a movie like this, with a lot of action. Only problem i got with this is that the subs aren't embedded directly into the video, so they dont appear when you watch it on xbox, but the lack of huge black bars at the top and bottom of the screen completly make up for it.
You dont need a modded xbox to watch it, any xbox 360, with an internet connection can play this video.
